title: IN SEARCH FOR TYPOGRAPHY BOOK
content:
hello !  
I am collecting typographic books-

since a longer time i would like to buy a book on  
typography, sort of recent fonts - not only the classics.

modern elegant well designed quality typefaces for practical use.  
serife/sanserif but definitely other than for example the fontshop  
catalogue.a book you can work with when doing businesscards/letterheads  
/Ci work.

the market is big and i didnt find anything really with a good  
overview

thanks for any suggestions.  
manu
author: manu burghart

comments.content:
Hi Manu,

as you are in Germany, how about [Schriftwechsel](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134928/http:/www.typografie.de/Unsere-Buecher/Typografie/Stephanie-de-Jong_Ralf-de-Jong/Schriftwechsel::598.html) by Stephanie & Ralf de Jong? See also [this review](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134928/http:/www.form.de/w3.php?nodeId=108&lang=1&newsId%5B2204%5D=364#2204) by [Kurt Weidemann](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134928/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kurt%20Weidemann) in Form, and [the dispute](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134928/http:/www.fontblog.de/alter-ohne-weisheit-oder) it has triggered on Fontblog.  
F
